<title level="1" right="Action">[Flurry of Blows](/Actions.aspx?ID=2817) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 116 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Make two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Apply your multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally. As a flourish ability, you can use Flurry of Blows only once per turn.
name: Flurry of Blows
